Set sail on an unforgettable 7-night European adventure aboard Legend of the Seas , beginning and ending in the vibrant city of Barcelona. Your journey takes you to the sun-kissed shores of Palma de Mallorca, the lavender-scented landscapes of Provence, and the Renaissance treasures of Florence before continuing on to the Eternal City of Rome and the historic seaside charm of Naples. Along the way, marvel at breathtaking architecture, world-class art, and stunning natural scenery that make each stop unique. With a perfect blend of cultural discovery, coastal beauty, and Mediterranean flair, this cruise is designed to inspire awe at every turn.
